attributes.action: A referendum to consult the UK population before Article 50 is triggered.
attributes.additional_details: Both recent Leave/Stay campaigns have provided the UK Population with false information and since the Referendum both parties have back-tracked on many of the issues Voters used to determine their decision. The UK Public must be involved every step of the way and understand the Governments proposals to negotiate an exit from the EU.
attributes.background: This is not a simple in/out decision and the Country must decide if Article 50 is triggered given the recent confirmed discrepancies in both Stay/Leave campaigns.The details to be negotiated by the Government must be outlined so that the UK population can decide, there is no timetable to trigger A50
